style.aesthetic: industrial monitoring, SCADA single-asset view, battery management system interface, curved ultrawide monitor, industrial control room, cinematic
style.mood: focused, technical, diagnostic, epic futuristic control center

layout.structure: left sidebar + main area + right sidebar

left_sidebar.title: SYSTEM DIAGRAM
left_sidebar.visual: vertical flow diagram showing: Solar Panels (top) → MPPT → Battery with BMS → Inverter → AC Bus. Each component as a rounded rectangle with connection lines. Data values shown next to each.

main_area.title: CELL VOLTAGES — 16S LiFePO4
main_area.description: Bar chart showing 16 cells. Each bar is a vertical column with voltage label on top. Color gradient from cell voltage: 3.10V=red, 3.20V=yellow, 3.25V=green, 3.30V=green, 3.40V=yellow.

below_chart.description: Row of 5 temperature indicators for different cell groups

panels.title: STATE OF CHARGE
panels.visual: large circular gauge, 72% filled, green arc

panels.title: POWER FLOW
panels.visual: horizontal bar centered at zero, showing power direction

panels.title: 24H HISTORY
panels.visual: small area chart showing SOC over time, dipping at night, rising during day

technical_details.render_style: photorealistic curved ultrawide monitor filling most of the frame, SCADA interface, close-up view
technical_details.lighting: cyan and green screen glow, dark background, subtle edge reflections on monitor bezel
technical_details.context: monitor fills 90% of frame, minimal room visible, focus on screen content, cinematic
technical_details.framing: tight shot on monitor, shallow depth of field blurring any background
